## Galaxy + Outflow Spectra

```{r, echo=FALSE}

inputPanel(
  selectInput("v_galaxy", label = "Galaxy Velocity:",
              choices = c(0, 20, 100, 200), selected = 0),
  
  sliderInput("v_outflow", label = "Outflow Velocity:",
              min = 100, max = 500, value = 100, step = 100),
  
  selectInput("lognh_outflow", label = "Outflow Column Density:",
              choices = c(20.0, 20.0625, 20.125, 20.1875, 20.25, 20.3125, 20.375, 20.4375, 20.5, 20.5625, 20.625, 20.6875, 20.75, 20.8125, 20.875, 20.9375, 21.0, 21.0625, 21.125, 21.1875, 21.25, 21.3125, 21.375, 21.4375, 21.5, 21.5625, 21.625, 21.6875, 21.75, 21.8125, 21.875, 21.9375, 22.0, 22.0625, 22.125, 22.1875, 22.25, 22.3125, 22.375, 22.4375, 22.5), selected = 20.0)
)

renderPlot({
  spectrum <- read.csv("./data/galaxyoutflow.csv")
  
  spectrum_sub <- spectrum[spectrum$v_gal==input$v_galaxy,]
  spectrum_sub <- spectrum_sub[spectrum_sub$v_out==input$v_outflow,]
  spectrum_sub <- spectrum_sub[spectrum_sub$lognh==input$lognh_outflow,]
  
  plot(spectrum_sub$x, spectrum_sub$y, type = "l", col=30,
       xlim=c(1210, 1232), ylim=c(0, 7100), 
       xlab = "Lambda", ylab = "Intensity")
})
```
